<h1> 🍻 Yu Shen <img src="https://forthebadge.com/images/badges/built-with-love.svg" alt="badge" align="right" /></h1>

<img src="src/lisa-profile.jpg" alt='readme-theme' align='right' width='33%' style='margin-left:10px'>

I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Edinburgh under the supervision of Prof. Aggelos Kiayias and Dr. Michele Ciampi.
Before that, I got my M.S. degree in Computer Science from Texas A&M University.
My master supervisor is Prof. Juan Garay.
I got my B.S. degree in Computer Science and Technology from Jilin University in July 2019.

My research interest includes the following:

- **Cryptography:** Proof-of-Work, Universal Composability, Cryptographic Tools for Decentralized Systems;
- **Distributed Computing:** Permissionless Consesnsus, Order Fairness in Transaction Serialization.
